items.sentence: I tried to get Tom to help me, but he wouldn\'t.
Could you give me a hand in the kitchen, please?
Even though Tom had a bad cold, he went to work.
Tom and Mary don\'t enjoy each other\'s company.
I was curious to know why Tom and Mary broke up.
French was the first foreign language I learned.
Give me some time to figure out what went wrong.
Tom keeps hives on his farm and sells the honey.
Tom doesn\'t like discussing his work with Mary.
You aren\'t allowed to do that without a permit.
The peace talks have been suspended for a while.
The police are investigating what happened here.
Why can\'t you just tell me what I want to know?
Why didn\'t you do what you were supposed to do?
I wouldn\'t blame you if you preferred to leave.
Tom isn\'t a very good singer, and neither am I.
Your parents are just worried about your safety.
I\'m sorry I wasn\'t able to help you yesterday.
I can always take the bus back to Boston, right?
I did a lot of stupid things when I was younger.
What\'s the real reason you don\'t want to sing?
Without Tom\'s help, I couldn\'t have done that.
I didn\'t know Tom was planning to go to Boston.
She realized that she had better tell the truth.
She tried to persuade him to attend the meeting.
She tried to persuade him to organize a boycott.
Perhaps Tom and Mary are more than just friends.
When we are together, time seems to stand still.
You should drop by his gallery if you have time.
Were you able to find what you were looking for?
I\'ve learned a lot from you over the past year.
Tom started reading when he was three years old.
Tom still has one person he can always count on.
Tom stood next to Mary, whispering into her ear.
Tom said that he hadn\'t intended to insult you.
Tom promised Mary he wouldn\'t complain anymore.
I don\'t think Tom is ever going to get married.
I don\'t think Tom knows who taught Mary French.
It doesn\'t sound like you\'ll be working today.
I guess that I\'m going to have to learn French.
I know that Tom can\'t do that as well as I can.
Tom asked me if I knew how to play the clarinet.
Tom began to suspect that Mary was lying to him.
I\'m really looking forward to seeing Tom again.
Sweet and sour pork is my favorite Chinese food.
Tom was only at Mary\'s party for a few minutes.
I\'m still not used to the way things work here.
I can\'t believe that Tom would do such a thing.
I can\'t figure out how Tom was able to do that.
Tom is thirteen, but he still believes in Santa.
